p: Importantly, in an earlier study, Muthumani et al. delivered an anti-CHIKV DMAb in combination with a CHIKV DNA vaccine, demonstrating both immediate and persistent protection against lethal challenge in mice [ 121]. This study supports the concept that pDNA-mAbs have the potential to be delivered in conjunction with protective vaccination, providing rapid protection, with the pDNA-mAb to cover the period needed to establish vaccine-induced immunity.
